name: admin.roles.listAssignments
desc: Lists assignments for all roles across entities. Options to scope results by any combination of roles or entities

cursor.desc: Set `cursor` to `next_cursor` returned by the previous call to list items in the next page.

entity_ids.desc: The entities for which the roles apply.

limit.desc: The maximum number of items to return. Must be between 1 - 200 both inclusive.

role_ids.desc: collection of role ids to scope results by.

sort_dir.desc: Sort direction. Default is descending on date_create, can be either ASC or DESC.

errors.feature_not_enabled: This API is currently not enabled.
errors.invalid_actor: This API is only enabled for the Admins/Owners.
errors.invalid_arguments: Required arguments either were not provided or contain invalid values.
errors.invalid_role_id: One or more role IDs could not be validated.
